name: game-of-life-classroom
description: A classroom Game of Life simulation for teaching financial literacy

scripts.build:all: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:migrate:ps: Get-Content server/migrations/002_town_hub_tables.sql | railway run --service "bank front_backends" psql $env:DATABASE_URL
scripts.db:seed: cd server && railway run --service "bank front_backends" node seed-town-hub.js
scripts.db:init: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: Classroom Game of Life
